messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near April Town Seventeen, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to budget-cuts, a number of wire eating mammals have swarmed into the maintenance areas.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Dana Styles. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: The nuke code is 13083. We will NOT be evacing the station, please instead make use of the mining station as a home until we can develop a cure.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in April Town Seventeen door subroutines. Severity level of 3. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Okay, we'll come and pick you guys up in about 5 minutes, cool?
